** As ** [ role ] 
** I need ** [ feature ] 
** So ** [ benefit ] 

### Details and Assumptions
* [ document what you know ] 

### Acceptance Criteria

``` gherkin
Given [ some context ]
When [ some action is taken ]
Then [ the result of the action is observed ]
```
